settings.label: Image favicon
settings.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

settings.label: Languages support RTL
settings.info: Enter ISO language code, separate by comma. Leave blank to enable for all languages. [Check ISO language code](https://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php)
A section with "Fluid container" will take-up the complete width of the viewport and will expand or shrink when ever the viewport is resized.
For header design where Menu and Logo are in 2 lines

settings.content: Allow multiple links, each link in a new line. Please upload to [Shopify files](/admin/settings/files) and paste link here. These formats TTF, OTF, WOFF & WOFF2 are supported.

settings.content: The button font is inherited from body text.

settings.label: Show variant options
settings.info: Product card is limited to showing only 1 option

settings.label: Number of option's values to display
settings.info: Set to 0 to display all option's values

settings.label: Show custom tag badges
settings.info: How to set up custom product tags? [See how](https://docs.minimog.co/collections-and-products/product-page/product-tag).

settings.label: Design
settings.info: Default design if option's name doesn't match any of the 5 names in the below settings

settings.label: Custom colors
settings.default:
red: #ff0000,
yellow: #ffff00,

Required: PNG images only!     Recommended size: 60x60 (px)

settings.label: Show delivery days for estimate shipping
Default country for estimate shipping
settings.info: Enter country code, for example: United States = US. Refer to the country code [here](https://shopify.dev/api/storefront/reference/common-objects/countrycode)

settings.label: Enable predictive search
settings.info: Enable predictive search so that suggested results appear immediately as you type into the search field. [Learn more](https://shopify.dev/themes/navigation-search/search/predictive-search)

settings.content: The default fields searched on are 'title', 'product_type', 'variants.title', and 'vendor'. For the best search experience, you should search on the default field set, or as few fields as possible.
It is designed to help you comply with data privacy laws like EU Cookie Law, European GDPR or California CCPA.

settings.label: Text
settings.default: I agree with the Terms & conditions

settings.label: Show on cart page & cart drawer
Message
settings.default: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.

settings.label: Product reviews app
settings.info: Select your preferred app. If you are using another app, please put the snippet code of the app to file: snippets/other-review-app-snippet.liquid or contact us for help.

settings.content: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.
